Browse the source code of netbsd/external/bsd/ntp/dist/libntp/strdup.c

1/* $NetBSD: strdup.c,v 1.4 2016/01/08 21:35:39 christos Exp $ */
2
3#include <config.h>
4
5#include <ntp_assert.h>
6#include "ntp_malloc.h"
7#include <string.h>
8
9#ifndef HAVE_STRDUP
10
11char *strdup(const char *s);
12
13char *
14strdup(
15 const char *s
16 )
17{
18 size_t octets;
19 char * cp;
20
21 REQUIRE(s);
22 octets = strlen(s) + 1;
23 if ((cp = malloc(octets)) == NULL)
24 return NULL;
25 memcpy(cp, s, octets);
26
27 return cp;
28}
29#else
30int strdup_c_nonempty_compilation_unit;
31#endif
32
